definition: to return (to)
to walk (side part of split character)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to return to/to come (or go) back
to return to
to go back and forth/to go to and fro/round trip
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to return to one's home town
to repatriate (e.g. prisoners of war)/to send back
return journey (e.g. home)
to return to the point of departure
to return to school
to linger/to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home
to turn back
to return home
gone forever
to return to one's true self/to regain the natural state
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate

sentences.english: Night decayed, a desk lamp, return yellow books depicting handwriting has light.
sentences.chinese: 夜阑珊，一盏台灯下，返黄书笺笔迹已淡。

sentences.english: Injections of tens of thousands take medicine, go out empty-handed back empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 打针吃药好几万，空手出门空手返。

sentences.english: Go home and enjoy you life"?"
sentences.chinese: 你返屋企享受你既生活啦“？

sentences.english: Yuan Ding five years, Emperor Li westbound parade to the Dazu County, and the temporary return of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 元鼎五年，汉武帝西行巡游到达祖厉县，临黄河而返。

sentences.english: The accused was remanded in custody for a further week to await the outcome of police investigation.
sentences.chinese: 被告被送返监狱再等1周以待警方调查结果。

sentences.english: The suspect was remanded in custody because someone who claimed to be a witness offered some new evidence.
sentences.chinese: 者的人提供新的证据，所以嫌疑犯被送返监狱候审。

sentences.english: I return such energy to whomever it belongs to.
sentences.chinese: 我送返这些能量到它所属的地方。

sentences.english: The west lake in Hangchow is a magnet for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 杭州西湖使游客撩船忘返。

sentences.english: Begging people to impeach the tyrant-free, but all in vain and back.
sentences.chinese: 人们苦苦哀求暴君的劾免，但都徒劳而返。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the cause of high return fines ratio and its influences.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了槽下返矿率高的原因及其不利影响。

sentences.english: The reflected head of the rectus femoris is also sometimes released to improve exposure.
sentences.chinese: 股直肌的返折头有时也予以松解以改善显露。

sentences.english: The soldier are sailing for old Blighty tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 士兵明日将启航返英国本土。

sentences.english: He dared not to enter and waited till midnight, but the chess playing continued, so he returned home disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 大用不敢入内，候至深夜，棋声不停，只得怅然而返。

sentences.english: Gratuitous pneumatic screen, sit since returned to the window.
sentences.chinese: 无端风动幕，起坐返窗前。
